title: Robinhood Favorites? High-Flying or Beaten-Down Stocks
itunes:title: Robinhood Favorites? High-Flying or Beaten-Down Stocks
description:
In this week's Bloomberg Intelligence Radio show, equity strategist Chris Cain looks at the impact of Robinhood on trading, stock picking and market prices. Technology analyst Anand Srinivasan previews Apple's earnings, while analyst Deb Aitken previews results for luxury and personal care companies and Duncan Fox lays out what's expected from beverage makers such as Diageo. Energy analyst Fernando Valle explores the impact of Chevron's proposed buyout of Noble and looks ahead to the sector's earnings.

The BI Radio show podcasts through Apple’s iTunes, Spotify and Luminary. It broadcasts on Saturdays and Sundays at noon on Bloomberg’s flagship station WBBR (1130 AM) in New York, 106.1 FM/1330 AM in Boston, 99.1 FM in Washington, 960 AM in the San Francisco area, channel 119 on SiriusXM, www.bloombergradio.com, and IPhone and Android mobile apps.

Bloomberg Intelligence, the research arm of Bloomberg L.P., provides in-depth analysis and data on more than 2,000 companies and 130 industries. On the Bloomberg terminal, run BI .

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
